channel.title: Need a good client and source
channel.description:
Hello, i need a decent client and source with an auto cache downloader please:) and gambling in it just wanna mess around with it and practice coding a bit. thanks.
Idk what i want as in 317 or others just what is the easiest to learn coding on?

item.title: Need a good client and source
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Hyperon:

As reiterated by many people, RSPS won’t teach you programming.[/quote][quote=“Hyperon, post:2, topic:548338”]As reiterated by many people, RSPS won’t teach you programming.[/quote][quote=“Hyperon, post:2, topic:548338”]As reiterated by many people, RSPS won’t teach you programming.[/quote][quote=“Hyperon, post:2, topic:548338”]As reiterated by many people, RSPS won’t teach you programming.[/quote][quote=“Hyperon, post:2, topic:548338”]As reiterated by many people, RSPS won’t teach you programming.[/quote][quote=“Hyperon, post:2, topic:548338”]As reiterated by many people, RSPS won’t teach you programming.[/quote][quote=“Hyperon, post:2, topic:548338”]As reiterated by many people, RSPS won’t teach you programming.

item.title: Need a good client and source
item.dc:creator: @Kjloveday Kjloveday
item.description:
@Kjloveday wrote:

ok but i look for rsps clients and source but half of them either don’t load client, also do most of them have auto cache downloader or do i have to do this myself?

Read full topic
item.source: Need a good client and source

item.title: Need a good client and source
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

I learned the basics of understand syntax and basic programming through nothing but reading/copying/pasting rsps code. Later in life when I wanted to take it further I went to a course.

Get yourself an IDE (Try Eclipse.) Download a bunch of popular sources and clients, and fuck with them all. They’ll all have their own different quirks and features, maybe you’ll have fun mashing a couple of things together? The thing is you need to just jump in and fuck with all the things, instead of us trying to read your mind what you want - which at this point nobody knows Just get into it.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a good client and source

item.title: Need a good client and source
item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

Find something you like in the download section.

Btw programming and programming RSPS is the same thing so if you want to learn to program a RSPS you need to learn to program full stop. Just learn the basics of Java. Integers, Strings, creating new instances of classes etc. and you will then be able to pick things up.

Try using an IDE too it will make life much easier. Eclipse is a good one.

Read full topic
